reserveHint.bullet1: Create a new CU Sports Center reservation waiting room.
reserveHint.bullet2: Once created, your friends can join the room with he generated access code.
reserveHint.head2: When to create a waiting room?
reserveHint.bullet3: When you are the first person to reserve the court and you friends do not have a waiting room yet.

joinHint.bullet1: Join an existing CU Sport Center reservation waiting room.
joinHint.bullet2: By joining a waiting room, you can make a court reservation together with your friends.
joinHint.head2: When to join a waiting room?
joinHint.bullet3: When your friend has already created a waiting room and you would like to create a reservation together with them.

fileTooBig: File size too large. The maximum file size is 2 MB. Please try again.

otherAccountDescription.type1: staff membership: 200 Baht/year/person [CU Personnel, Retired CU Personnel]
otherAccountDescription.type2: student membership: 420 Baht/year/person [CU Student/CU Exchange Students]
otherAccountDescription.type3: staff-spouse membership: 2,000 Baht/year/person [Staff's family/ Alumnis and Family]
otherAccountDescription.type6: full membership-spouse and children: 8,000 Baht/year/person [General Public - Family]
otherAccountDescription.type8: indoor stadium-spouse and children: 3,000 Baht/year/person [General Public - Family (per court)]
